author: yonik
msg: SOLR-2592: avoid splitting composite router hash domains

author: liyin
msg: [HBASE-7276]  Update the readRequestCount for getRegionInfo only when called from RPC
Summary: D645831 increased the readRequestCount for every call of getRegionInfo and actually we shall only do this if the function is called from RPC level. So fix this problem in this diff.
Test Plan: Tested on one of the RS in the titan shadow025 and seems like the request cnt back to normal.

author: markrmiller
msg: SOLR-4030: Allow rate limiting Directory IO based on the IO context.

author: donaldp
msg: Update the POM dependency traversal code so that;
* excluded dependencies do not get traversed and then excluded but are excluded prior to loading the dependencies POM file
* inability to load a dependencies POM does not result in failure but it is assumed that the dependency does not have a POM

author: danielsh
msg: Followup to r1418830: improve the new test.
Rewrite so that it will FAIL sometimes.  Remove errorful uses
